data.name: Donut County - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
It’s Like Garbage For Your Ears
Visit Donut County with 42 charming tracks that take you from Gecko Park to Raccoon Lagoon and 999 Feet Underground. Get cozy with ukes and textured beats inspired by the LA beat scene. Dance to the Quack Anthem. Experience Raccoon House Music. This soundtrack makes great background music for study, work, or having a relaxing garbage day.

The Donut County OST comprises all 39 tracks from the game and includes 3 bonus tracks. It runs just over 1 hour and 40 minutes.

The Donut County OST is written and produced by Daniel Koestner. Music marked with an asterisk is written and produced by Ben Esposito.

Track List:
1. Garbage Day
2. Slackers
3. Breaking Ground
4. Holes
5. Pup’s Odyssey
6. Trash Is Treasure
7. 999ft Below
8. Lazy River
9. Popcorn
10. Nesting
11. Kindling
12. Dust Clears*
13. Owned
14. Bird of Paradise
15. Migration
16. Throne Room*
17. Bandit
18. Broken
19. Honey
20. Salt & Pep
21. BK Squad
22. Landmark
23. Hollow Earth!
24. Quack Anthem*
25. Fun Flume
26. 405 South
27. Mira’s Song
28. Hackers*
29. Raccoon House Music*
30. TK Method*
31. Study Beats*
32. Waiting Room*
33. Trash King*
34. Boss Fight*
35. Falling
36. The Pickle
37. Trashopedia
38. Reunion
39. Sandcastle
40. Morning Shift (Bonus)
41. Donut Run (Bonus)
42. Apology (Bonus)
